DOC.brief_summary: This study is intended to test the influence of weight training on physical symptoms, physical activity and brain structure and function in Gulf War Veterans with chronic widespread muscle pain.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Exercise Training on Pain and Brain Function in Gulf War Veterans
DOC.criteria: Veteran of the Persian Gulf War Chronic muscle pain Regular participation in resistance exercise Color blindness Claustrophobia Medical conditions that could explain the Veteran's pain Use of exclusionary drugs 3 weeks prior to testing Major depressive disorder with melancholic features Substance abuse Schizophrenia Bipolar disorder
